data.meta_site_name: School of Visual Arts | SVA | New York City
data.text:
SVA Features - Eric Weisberg 01:58

Eric Weisberg is an Executive Creative Director at JWT in New York City, and teaches in the Advertising program at School of Visual Arts. Eric's unique approach to integrated design and advertising, combined with teaching onsite at the JWT offices, creates an experience for SVA students which is unparalleled, and many of them wind up with internships and jobs at JWT because of this. Featuring: Eric Weisberg, Faculty Chris Jessick (BFA Film and Video 2006) Director, Producer, Cinematographer, Editor
